ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: The question
ygData.msgSnippet: It s not just tradeskills. It s alot of hunting in weird places to get no drop stuff. It took me 2 years to do this quest. I did some of the parts before it
ygData.messageBody:
It's not just tradeskills. It's alot of hunting in weird places to get no drop stuff. It took me 2 years to do this quest. I did some of the parts before it was made even more difficult. The part of finding the lost dwarf in Kael... That is a tough one.
It is a pretty good item though and I still wear it on my lvl 66 cleric.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-07-15, 12:30:00 you wrote: =======

>There is a great quest item with ext enhancement on it It is called
>the Blessed Coldain Prayer Shawl it is a tradeskill quest however and
>takes some time to complete and has the effect of "Zephyr of Brell"
>which is 30 extension on your beneficial spells, as a bonus it also
>has FT 3 as well. If you plan on getting your trade skills up then it
>would be a great piece of gear to get as it is a shoulder item,
>shoulders are the hardest piece of gear to upgrade.
>
>http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/item.html?item=11999
>
>
